snippet.title: SIMULACRA 3 TEASER TRAILER
snippet.description:
Beware the Beldam!
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1925970/Simulacra_3/

Kaigan Games and Neon Doctrine are excited to announce the third chapter of their critically acclaimed found phone horror series, Simulacra. Expanding on the previous games with new real time elements and a chilling new story, Simulacra 3 invites you to explore a charming little town, and a new frontier of digital horror.
